text: Va dar on [Tavrot] ʙaroi eson [Bani Isroil] muqarrar dostem, ki: "Con dar ʙaroʙari conu casm dar ʙaroʙari casm va ʙini dar ʙaroʙari ʙini va gus dar ʙaroʙari gus va dandon dar ʙaroʙari dandon ast va [hatto] zaxmho qasos dorand". Pas, har ki az on guzast namojad, on [ʙaxsis] kafforai [gunohoni] ust. Va har kas ʙa ahkome, ki Alloh taolo nozil kardaast, hukm nakunad, [az hududi ilohi farotar raftaast va] sitamgor ast
